Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit

Scourge:

This is Scourge, Child of Megatron the 1st, clone of Autobot leader Prime, 
and Current leader of the Decepticon forces of 2023, Lower these sheilds, 
castaway your weapons, we are here to seal the ark until the day comes when 
our brothers may walk the earth like the giants they are." "May i tell you 
one thing though, every autobot, Maximal, and decepticon on this side of the 
passage has every talent needed to protect the Ark, Some for strength, some 
for tech work, another for scouting, but i am here for one reason other then 
leading, one reason above all...." He kneeled on one knee as his shoulder 
mounts began humming the four slots opened and four large warheads opened... 
they had been ment for the mountain, but he knew anybot in his time would 
back down from being scraped by one of these things. He reached behind his 
back and pulled out his cannon, it looked alot like primes, except for one 
thing, it also began hissing as the piolet light kicked in and the flame 
emerged from the barrel. Prime chose me for my brains, megatron built as his 
own personal war machine, guess which i prefer to be. He lowered his head as 
the missiles armed...

Grimlock was slowly walking forward as were the dino-bots, Mirage intercepted 
them. "Guys chill o-k, i'm telling you he's just bluffing whoever is in 
there."

Scouge looked up one last time. "Open the door in peace or were coming in 
anyway."

--part1_5f.39b51385.2bf842dd_boundary
